summary: Imperial armor retexture and added 2 alternative color, blue and royal purple.
descriptionHtml:
--
[color=Red]READ[/color]
--
Check my other Retex

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1686

--
== == ==
DESCRIPTION
== == ==
A simple retex of the red imperial armor (Male only) making it snow friendly.

Why make it blue? Well, it reminds me of Centurion (film) 2011. :D
== == ==

--Added Royal purple thanks to @ninjaman0010. :)

--Will also add black cuirass retaining steel shoulder guards.. soon... i  think

Install:
-- Copy \"Data\" to your Skyrim directory

Uninstall:
-- Simply delete in \'textures\\armor\\imperial\\m\\\'
    boots.dds , cuirass.dss , gauntlets.dds , helmetfull.dds

[color=Mediumspringgreen]DESCRIPTION[/color]
==
Replaces vanilla bow forward running animation and bow sound effects. Questions about the SFX, it is inspired by Lord of the Rings trilogy

Currently in [color=Orangered]BETA[/color]
==
[color=Red]RECOMMENDED mods[/color]
==
1. [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5164]Proper Length Arrows by Madcat221[/url]
2. Faster Arrows by Fordperfect
==
[color=Mediumspringgreen]INSTALL/UNINSTALL[/color]
==
Readme in the download file
==
author: TheFPSmachine
